name: Sharn
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, that isn't magic

features.name: Archetypical Shape
features.description: The Sharn cannot change shape or have its shape changed, and no other creature can adopt the shape of a Sharn or anything approximating it.

features.name: Evasion
features.description: If the sharn is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the sharn instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

features.name: Magic Resistance
features.description: The sharn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

features.name: Magic Weapons (Monstrous Form)
features.description: The sharn's weapon attacks are magical.

features.name: Hex Portal
features.description: As a bonus action, the sharn can open one hex portal at a point the sharn can see within 20 ft. The hex portal remains as long as the sharn concentrates on it. It can have up to three hex portals active at once, and it can use a bonus action to move each hex portal 20 ft. to a point the sharn can see. The sharn can treat the hex portal as its location for purposes of determining what it can see, and it can use the portal as the origin point for any attacks or spells. Other creatures can't penetrate the portal to attack through it, but can ready attacks against the sharn if it attacks or casts spells through the portal. In such a case, the sharn gets a +5 bonus to AC and Dexterity saves due to cover.

features.name: Regeneration
features.description: If the sharn starts its turn with at least 1 hit point and has no hex portal open, it regains 10 hit points.

features.name: Swiftness
features.description: The sharn gets a +2 bonus to AC and Dexterity saves (included in the stats above). In addition, on its turn, it can take an extra action. If it takes the Attack action, it can make only one attack. If it takes the Cast a Spell action, it can cast only a cantrip.

features.name: Stone Camouflage
features.description: Dakini has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

features.name: Mind Muddle (Recharge 4-6)
features.description: The sharn cast Dominate Person on a Humanoid or Hold Monster on a creature that isn't a Humanoid. If the saving throws agaisnt Mind Muddle fails by 5 or more, the creature is instead subjected to the feeblemind spell. While under the effect of that feeblemind, the creature is immune to Mind Muddle

features.name: Amorphous (Slime Form)
features.description: The sharn can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

features.name: Arcane Sense
features.description: The sharn ia aware of the presence of spellcaster magical effect within 2 miles of it. It know the distance and direction to each spellcaster and magical effect, but can't sense anything else about it. A spellcaster or object protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceives in this manner.

spellcasting.description: The sharn is a 12th-level spellcaster. The sharn's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The sharn has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sharn makes three longsword attacks. If it hits a creature with one of these attacks, it can make a claws attack against it as part of the same attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Transform
bonus_actions.description: The sharn transforms into its monstrous form or reverts to its slime form. Any equipment which are merging within its slime form is equipped in its monstrous form.

credits: Ai đó từng có biệt danh discord là Catt

name: Sú Spores
senses: darkvision 120 ft, blindsight 60 ft, passive Perception 10

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The sus makes three Claw attacks or two Rotting attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rotting
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 4) poison damage with range, or 6 (1d8 + 4) necrotic damage if used with melee attack.

actions.name: Spores (Recharge 5–6)
actions.description: A 30-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the Sus. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area that isn't a Plant must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 16 (4d8) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The cloud of toxic spores still alive even if Sus die.

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: The frog can breathe air and water.

features.name: Symbiotic Spores
features.description: The frog is covered in a layer of symbiotic spores that provide it with resistance to poison and acid damage. In addition, the spores can be released as a defensive mechanism. As an action, the frog can release a cloud of spores in a 10-foot radius around it. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 7 (2d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

features.name: Brave
features.description: Ếch cộng sinh has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

features.name: Blood Frenzy
features.description: Ếch cộng sinh has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Ếch cộng sinh makes two Claw attacks or two Rotting attacks.

actions.name: Poison G
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) poison damage. Dex check hoặc bị graple. DC 13. Str check để thoát.

actions.name: Poison P
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 poison damage.

name: Sleepy Stone Horse
damage_immunities: poison, piercing, psychic, bludgeoning, slashing, from nonmagical attacks that aren't misthril
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, petrified
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

features.name: Immutable Form
features.description: the sleepy stone horse is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

features.name: Magic Resistance
features.description: the sleepy stone horse has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

features.name: Magic Weapons
features.description: the sleepy stone horse's weapon attacks are magical.

features.name: Immortal Creature
features.description: When the sleepy stone horse's HP drops to 0 for any reason, it will fall asleep. If awakened by a Red Ash Lantern before 7 days have elapsed since the last awakening, when awake, the sleepy stone horse will have twice its previous HP. Each time it wakes up, it will be able to use the following spells an arbitrary number of times: 1st time: *misty step*. Second time: *misty step, banishment*. 3rd time: *misty step, banishment, guardian of faith*. 4th time on: *misty step, banishment, guardian of faith, mordenkainen's faithful hound*.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5–6)
actions.description: The sleepy stone horse targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

description_footer: Ngựa đá của Phù Thủy Tro Đỏ

features.name: Sense Magic
features.description: Dakini senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: Magic can't put Dakini to sleep.

features.name: Magic Weapons
features.description: Dakini's weapon attacks are magical.

features.name: Blessing Moonlight
features.description: In the moonlight, Dakini has advantage when she attacks made by longsword.

features.name: Battle experience
features.description: Dakini's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

features.name: Stone Camouflage
features.description: Dakini has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

spellcasting.description: Dakini's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Dakini makes two attacks by longsword.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage, or 13 (2d10 + 6) necrotic damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Dance Blade
actions.description: If Dakini only makes one attack by longswort and hit, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be Charmed until Dakini or Dakini's companions do anything harmful to it.

reactions.name: Shield
reactions.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

name: Mizuumi
damage_resistances: acid, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

features.name: Spirit charmed
features.description: When any creature comes within 5ft of the edge of the mizuumi, it must wis save, if it fails the creature is charmed and enters the middle of the lake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mizuumi makes three lance attacks.

actions.name: Freezing Lance
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Freezing Strikes (Recharge 6)
actions.description: The mizuumi uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the mizuumi's next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Hugging Water
bonus_actions.description: As a bonus action, the mizuumi makes a attack and hit, range 15ft cube, the creature in range was submerged in water (grappled).

description_footer: Là một cái hồ nước với nhiều đóm đóm bay trên mặt. Hiện thân là một con cá lớn

name: Hulking Shadow Demon
damage_immunities: acid, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, petrified
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

features.name: Acid Absorption
features.description: Whenever the hulking shadow demon is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

features.name: Immutable Form
features.description: The hulking shadow demon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

features.name: Magic Resistance
features.description: The hulking shadow demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

features.name: Magic Weapons
features.description: The hulking shadow demon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 22 (4d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

name: Shadow Stalker
damage_resistances: acid, slashing, bludgeoning, necrotic, thunder, fire, cold from magical and nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
senses: darkvision 120 ft, Devil's Sight 60ft, passive Perception 16

features.name: Incorporeal Movement
features.description: The shadow stalker can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

features.name: Light Sensitivity
features.description: While in bright light, the shadow stalker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

features.name: Shadow Stealth
features.description: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow stalker can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

features.name: Lightfooted
features.description: The shadow stalker can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

features.name: Death Burn
features.description: When the shadow stalker dies, nonmagical light flashes out from it in a 10-foot radius as its body and possessions, other than metal or magic objects, burn to ash. Any creature in that area and able to see the bright light must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 10 (3d6) radiant damage and, if the creature can see the light, is blinded until the end of its next turn. If the saving throw is successful, the creature takes half the damage and isn't blinded.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Shadow Step
actions.description: The shadow stalker magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see. Before or after teleporting, it can make one melee attack.

actions.name: Darkness (Recharges 5-6)
actions.description: The shadow stalker casts darkness without any components. Int is its spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.description: As a bonus action, the shadow stalker targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the shadow stalker dies, or it is incapacitated. Until the curse ends, the gains the following benefits: • It deals an extra 3 damage on damage rolls against the cursed target. • Any attack roll it makes against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20. • If the cursed target dies, the shadow stalker regains 13 hit points.

reactions.name: Armor of Hexes
reactions.description: When hit by an attack roll by a creature cursed by the shadow stalker's Hexblade's Curse, roll a d6. On a roll of 4 or higher, the attack instead misses the demon, regardless of its roll.

legendary_actions.description: The shadow stalker can take 1 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The shadow stalker regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

actions.name: Eli's blessings
actions.description: Shadow stalker can split into 3 clones, of which 2 clones also have the same health bar as the body, deal half the damage, and other effects are the same as the body.

description_footer: Tín đồ trung thành nhất của nữ thần Eilistraee
credits: Ai đó từng có biệt danh discord là Catt

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The shadow stalker makes two attacks by Tua.

actions.name: Tua
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage in melee, or 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage at range. Target much success Dex save or grappled and Con Ngài Gai can make 2 attack bonus by Tua with any creature in ranged.

name: Winter Rabbit
damage_resistances: piercing, bludgeoning, slashing, from nonmagical attacks

features.name: Pack Tactics
features.description: The winter rabbit has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the winter rabbit's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

features.name: Snow Camouflage
features.description: The winter rabbit has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

features.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
features.description: The winter rabbit has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The winter rabbit makes two Bite claw.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If had adv then dmg is 4d6 + 3
